titles.title: We Will Worship the Lamb of Glory

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We will worship the Lamb of glory newline We will worship the King of kings newline We will worship the Lamb of glory newline We will worship the King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And with our hands lifted high, newline We will worship and sing newline And with our hands lifted high, newline We come before You rejoicing. newline With our hands lifted high to the sky newline When the world wonders why newline We'll just tell them we're loving our King...Oh newline We'll just tell them that we're loving our King
